heading: Cleansing Pyres Disabled in Headhunt Areas
content: Season 7: Season of Witchcraft is here and the updated our S7 Build Guides last week already! This is just the beginning as we will keep updating content as the Season of Witchcraft reveal its secrets! Blizzard just released the Diablo 4 Season 7 Information: Cleansing Pyres Disabled! We hope you enjoy the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus for the start of Season 7 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes. We're continuing to work on more updates for If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
